players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Bob is suspicious because he acted quickly last night."
Bob: "I'm not Bob. Don't trust him."
You: "I am the detective and I know Bob is the mafioso. However, he has just claimed that he is not Bob. This could be a ploy to throw us off his trail. We need to keep an eye on him."
Diana: "I will investigate Bob further to see if he's the mafioso. We need more evidence before we accuse him."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
